name: Witch's Brew (aceofswords)
description:
This was for a writing class where we were supposed to "get familiar with RPGMaker," which was kind of a laugh for me as someone who's been using the program regularly for ~4 years. I had just gotten MZ and wanted an excuse to dink around in it. I think it's cute enough to be worth uploading. It's about a 5-10 minute experience, mostly RTP assets,  intended to showcase writing and worldbuilding. Maybe I'll come back to it someday.

Plugins: VisustellaMZ
Icons: Caz
Images: Mimo
